name: customer_search
title: Customer search
description: List customers using a substring search
statement:
SELECT customer_id, company_name, contact_name  FROM customers
WHERE
  country = $country AND
  (
    LOWER(company_name) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER($search_string), '%') OR
    LOWER(contact_name) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER($search_string), '%')
  )
